attributes.action: Introduce legislation/law that ALL drivers intent on towing a caravan must pass a seperate driving test aimed solely at towing caravan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe there should be a seperate driving test for those people (anybody) who wishes to tow a caravan/trailer of any variety to have to take responsibility and pass a valid driving test. Just as a driver with HGV/LGV has too as does a bus/coach driver, those drivers who use trailers/caravans should, by law, have to hold a suitable licence. There are too many instances where drivers 'pulling' a trailer or caravan seem oblivious to the laws which confine their road speed and indeed position.
